pullrequest.title: First version of Displays widget with sample DisplayPlugins

content.raw:
I’m on-board with not pushing partially functional code to default.  
I’ll leave the incomplete features in this PR for the review process \(I think it’s useful to see two types of displays\), and give another go at setting the visibility. If at the end it’s not resolved, I would be alright will dropping the RTF displaay plugin since it doesn’t use an overlay where it should and it might be a while before that task reaches the top of the stack.

If other blockers-for-merge come up, we can target this PR and followups at a feature branch, so the PRs can be reviewed in small pieces still, and then once the right level of functionality is in the feature branch we can merge that to default.
content.html:
I’m on-board with not pushing partially functional code to default.
I’ll leave the incomplete features in this PR for the review process (I think it’s useful to see two types of displays), and give another go at setting the visibility. If at the end it’s not resolved, I would be alright will dropping the RTF displaay plugin since it doesn’t use an overlay where it should and it might be a while before that task reaches the top of the stack.

If other blockers-for-merge come up, we can target this PR and followups at a feature branch, so the PRs can be reviewed in small pieces still, and then once the right level of functionality is in the feature branch we can merge that to default.
